info.name: Crawdwall Capital API - Final Complete
info.description: Complete API collection for Crawdwall Capital event crowdfunding platform with file uploads, officer downloads, and real-time notifications

formdata.value: A comprehensive technology summit featuring AI, blockchain, and sustainable tech innovations. This event will bring together industry leaders, developers, and entrepreneurs to explore the future of technology.
Planning: 4 months, Marketing: 3 months, Event execution: 3 days, Follow-up: 2 months

Revenue will be generated through multiple streams: Ticket sales (50% - $250k), Corporate sponsorships (35% - $175k), Vendor exhibitions (15% - $75k). Early bird tickets at $399, regular at $599, VIP packages at $999. Expected 800 attendees.
Software developers, tech entrepreneurs, startup founders, IT professionals, and technology enthusiasts aged 25-50 with interest in emerging technologies and business transformation.

formdata.description: Upload PDF, DOC, or XLS files (up to 10MB each, max 5 files)
